text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABNC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABNC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $LN$ is $36$ units.
The length of the line $AL$ is $27$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $40$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $L$.
The line connecting $N$ and $L$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $L$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AL$, $AN$, $BC$, $BL$, $NC$, and $NL$, forming the parallelogram $ABNC$.
